      • getCharacterEncoding

        public java.lang.String getCharacterEncoding()
        クラスからコピーされた説明: ByteToCharConverter

        定義:

      • flush

        public int flush(char[] chars,
                 int off,
                 int len)
        クラスからコピーされた説明: ByteToCharConverter
        Writes any remaining output to the output buffer and resets the converter to its initial state.
        定義:
        flush クラス内 ByteToCharConverter
        パラメータ:
        chars - char array to receive flushed output.
        off - start writing to output array at this offset.
        len - stop writing to output array at this offset (exclusive).

      • reset

        public void reset()
        クラスからコピーされた説明: ByteToCharConverter
        Resets converter to its initial state.
        定義:
        reset クラス内 ByteToCharConverter

      • convert

        public int convert(byte[] bytes,
                   int byteStart,
                   int byteEnd,
                   char[] chars,
                   int charStart,
                   int charEnd)
        クラスからコピーされた説明: ByteToCharConverter
        Converts an array of bytes containing characters in an external encoding into an array of Unicode characters. This method allows a buffer by buffer conversion of a data stream. The state of the conversion is saved between calls to convert. Among other things, this means multibyte input sequences can be split between calls. If a call to convert results in an exception, the conversion may be continued by calling convert again with suitably modified parameters. All conversions should be finished with a call to the flush method.
        定義:
        convert クラス内 ByteToCharConverter
        パラメータ:
        bytes - byte array containing text to be converted.
        byteStart - begin conversion at this offset in input array.
        byteEnd - stop conversion at this offset in input array (exclusive).
        chars - character array to receive conversion result.
        charStart - start writing to output array at this offset.
        charEnd - stop writing to output array at this offset (exclusive).
        戻り値:
        the number of bytes written to output.
